name: Honey Deuce Melon Ball Punch

ingredients.name: raspberry liqueur
ingredients.original_string: 1/2 cup raspberry liqueur, such as Chambord

ingredients.name: fresh lemon juice from 1 to 2 lemons
ingredients.original_string: 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice (from 1 to 2 lemons)

instructions: Use a melon baller or mini ice cream scoop to scoop the honeydew into balls. (These serve as your tennis ball garnish.) Freeze until ready to serve.
Combine the lemonade, vodka, raspberry liqueur and lemon juice in a pitcher or large measuring cup. Stir with a wooden spoon and refrigerate until very cold, about 30 minutes.
Fill highball or old-fashioned glasses with ice. Stir the batched cocktail once more and divide it among the glasses. Skewer 2 melon balls with a toothpick to garnish each drink.Â
